text: this story happened at Giza pyramids
area thousands of years ago
archaeologists have learned about it
from the hieroglyphic writing on a stele
installed in the food of Sphinx statue
the steel tells that Moses the false
dream before he became a king
- Moses was a son of the Pharaoh almond
will top the second but he was not the
Crown Prince despite this he was eager
to succeed his father in power
[Music]
archaeologists say that this dream meant
to bestow legitimacy upon his unexpected
kingship according to the stele that
Moses went out for hunting his
destination was the Pyramus plateau at
Giza it was very hot day he felt tired
so the imprints try to find a shadow to
protect him from the heat of the Sun
Sphinx was the nearest monument he took
a nap in the shadow of Sphinx hid the
statue was built as a mythical creature
with the head of human and the body of a
lion celebrating power and wisdom but
because the statue has been sculptured
inside a low Valley near the pyramids
the body of the statue landfilled except
the head
according to the translation of the
steel statues spoke to taut mosses while
sleeping spanked said look at me observe
me my son Thomas my condition is like
one in illness I shall give to you the
kingship the sand of the desert upon
which I used to be now confronts and
suffocates me and it is in order to
cause you to do what is in my heart that
I have waited for and that had happened
to Tomas is the force became the Pharaoh
he did remove the dirt from around the
Sphinx also he built an adobe wall
around the statue to prevent dust from
gathering around it again
restoration of Sphinx is one of the most
achievements the archaeologists are
saying that this story was a piece of
propaganda and it was his efficient way
to the 9-year kingship
